name: accessibilityRotor(_:textRanges:)
desc: Create an Accessibility Rotor replacing the specified system-provided Rotor. The Rotor will be attached to the current Accessibility element, and each entry will go the specified range of that element.
declaration: func accessibilityRotor(_ systemRotor: AccessibilitySystemRotor, textRanges: [Range<String.Index>]) -> some View
